abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32576314, pmid32592113, pmid32579380, pmid32593196, pmid32592519, pmid32573433, pmid32577716, pmid32579023, pmid32573355, pmid32519594, pmid32542396, pmid32578378, pmid32579379, pmid32590589, pmid32576332, pmid32589811, pmid32577762, pmid32576313, pmid32578525, pmid32579806
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.30
